item.title: Explaining Security (Review Pt. 4)
item.description:
Explaining Security (Review Pt. 4)

Decisions for or against technologies in a corporate environment are usually based on two major factors: available know-how & security. And to me that makes perfect sense. Who would want to make themselves more vulnerable than they already are? Right... nobody would want to do that.
